Reviews.Title: “A great luxurious hotel”
Reviews.Author: aequitas_8
Reviews.Content: This is a spectacular hotel to say the least. The concierge was very friendly as was all the staff behind the desk. They set us up with a private tour of a Murano glass factory as well as a water taxi to the island. The rooms were spacious, clean, and well kept. All the staff were courteous and great to deal with. If I ever get back to Venice, Iâ€™ll stay at this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “WONDERFUL”
Reviews.Author: hasina_banu
Reviews.Content: My teens and myself really enjoyed stayed in hotel sofitel in venice. it is pleasure and a nice place to stay. we trust the hotel and sleep soundly there. i will like to recomend my friends to stay in SOFITEL. It is a wonderful place to rest and their service is very good. Hotel is very clean this is very important for me and my family. i was being help by a helpful staff of SOFITEL Mr. Lucio. he guide me in many ways while my stay in venice. he even go on extra mile by assisting me on my booking to next country. A very much THANK YOU to Mr Lucio. May god bless him and others of SOFITEL Staff in Venice.

Reviews.Title: “We just had too much fun”
Reviews.Author: jramseych
Reviews.Content: If you come out the front door of the hotel and cross the bridge to the right there will be a plaza immediately on the left. On the left of that plaza there is a coffee shop that has good service and continental breakfast fare. We thought we were getting good value for the money. and their milk coffee (Milk with coffee) was outstanding. The boss speaks and understands English. If you go there, tell them Stefan from the hotel papadopo;i sent you. You will get their attention as far as service is concerned. On the same plaza to the right there is a food joint we suggest you do not frequent. They had more than 10 tables open after 9 pm one night. my wife and daughter wanted a drink and sit and read a book outside. We were told: Dinner only! and shoed away by the server. We retreated inside the hotel papadopoli, had a drink there and read our books at the bar. Even though it was cozy and comfortable inside the hotel, we would have rather been outdoors, which the waiter at the food joint wrecked. SO: DON'T GO THERE. Our nicest dining experience during our stay was right after the before mentioned plaza. There is a restaurant not very far down the alley on the left. The food was great, the service superb, and the value was good.

Reviews.Title: “Perfection!!!”
Reviews.Author: califonriagirl
Reviews.Content: It was our first trip to italy and we ended up staying an extra night in Venice. The hotel is so easy to find - the rooms was perfect (plenty of room for me and my sister) , great views of canal, and Stefano and his staff (the conceirge and front desk staff) were outstanding and so accommodating - I would highly recommend the hotel. Already planning next year's trip - Pam (California), and Mindy (Miami)
